name: Armor Heart
description:
Grab some controllers & friends and start blasting each other in this mech mayhem multiplayer!

Game uses dual stick tank controls:

Sticks:
Both UP: Forwards
Both DOWN: Backwards
Both LEFT: Strafe Left
Both RIGHT: Strafe Right
Left UP, right DOWN: Turn Right
Right UP, left DOWN: Turn Left
Left LEFT, Right RIGHT: Jump
Left RIGHT, Right, LEFT: Dash

Trigger: Primary gun
Bumper: Secondary gun

Connect at least two controllers to start. You can rebind the buttons in the launcher.

Credits:
Code & Assets: Samuli Jääskeläinen
Music (CC0): Juhani Junkala
